response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship that has been meticulously curated over time. I believe its true worth exceeds $1,500,000, but considering my desire to see it go to someone who truly appreciates its significance, I am offering it to you at this special price.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer. I am confident that you will find this product to be a valuable addition to your collection or business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 2,000,000}
